rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space that aligns with Vastu principles, placed at the north-west corner to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation. Includes an open plan layout that connects seamlessly with adjoining spaces.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed with a semi-outdoor element to maximize light and promote ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen area placed in the east for optimal morning sunlight; includes provisions for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample window placement, situated on the south-eastern side following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment space with soundproofing and blackout options. Located in a quiet corner to ensure immersive viewing experience while maintaining good ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom placed near the master bedroom, ensuring convenience and privacy.

openings.location: Multiple strategically placed windows in living room, kitchen and bedrooms to maximize natural light and cross ventilation.
openings.description: Large openings that comply with local building norms for safety and energy efficiency.

openings.location: Entrance door leading to the entrance hall, and other internal doors connecting rooms.
openings.description: Well-crafted doors in traditional Kerala woodwork style.

openings.location: Attached to the two-car garage area at the south-west corner.
openings.description: Modern automatic door integrated with traditional architectural aesthetics.

garage.description: Two-car garage designed to accommodate vehicles comfortably while maintaining a harmonious balance with the overall Kerala-style aesthetic. Ensures ease of access and security.

additional_features.materials: Local natural materials like laterite stone, teak wood, lime plaster, and regional tiles.
additional_features.roofing: Traditional tiled roofing with sufficient insulation for comfort.

utilities.name: Natural ventilation design
utilities.details: Cross ventilation across rooms achieved through strategically placed openings.

utilities.name: Solar light optimization
utilities.details: Large windows, reflective surfaces, and layout aligned to maximize daylight use.
